price: Et ceux qui ont mécru et traité de mensonges Nos versets, ceux-là sont les gens du Feu où ils demeureront éternellement. Et quelle mauvaise destination !
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَكَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna kafarū wakadhabū biāyātinā ulāika aṣḥābu al-nāri khālidīna fīhā wabi'sa al-maṣīru
